verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that they take <S%H3947><s%> for me an offering <S%H8641><s%>: of every man <S%H376><s%> whose heart <S%H3820><s%> maketh him willing <S%H5068><s%> ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> my offering <S%H8641><s%>.
And this is the offering <S%H8641><s%> which ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> of them <S%H2091><s%>: gold, and silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>,
and blue <S%H8504><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%>, and scarlet <S%H8438><s%>, and fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and goats <S%H5795><s%>' hair,
and rams <S%H352><s%>' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red <S%H119><s%>, and <S%H8476><s%> sealskins <S%H5785><s%>, and acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>,
oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and for the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>,
onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and stones <S%H68><s%> to be set <S%H4394><s%>, for the ephod <S%H646><s%>, and for the breastplate <S%H2833><s%>.
And let them make <S%H6213><s%> me a sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, that I may dwell <S%H7931><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

According to all that I show <S%H7200><s%> thee <S%H8403><s%>, the pattern of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of all the furniture <S%H3627><s%> thereof <S%H6213><s%>, even so shall ye make it.

And they shall make <S%H6213><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height thereof <S%H6967><s%>.

And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, within <S%H1004><s%> and without <S%H2351><s%> shalt thou overlay <S%H6823><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and shalt make upon it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt cast <S%H3332><s%> four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for it <S%H5414><s%>, and put them in the four <S%H702><s%> feet <S%H6471><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>; and two rings <S%H2885><s%> shall be on the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of it <S%H8147><s%>, and two rings <S%H2885><s%> on the other side of it <S%H8145><s%>.
And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H935><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> into the rings <S%H2885><s%> on the sides <S%H6763><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, wherewith to bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.
The staves <S%H905><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the rings <S%H2885><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>: they shall not be taken from it <S%H5493><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> which I shall give thee <S%H5414><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the breadth thereof <S%H7341><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>; of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H8147><s%>, at the two ends <S%H7098><s%> of the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%>.

And make <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the one end <S%H7098><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> cherub <S%H3742><s%> at the other <S%H259><s%> end <S%H7098><s%>: of one piece with the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> on the two <S%H8147><s%> ends thereof <S%H7098><s%>.

And the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> shall spread <S%H6566><s%> out their wings <S%H3671><s%> on high <S%H4605><s%>, covering <S%H5526><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> with their wings <S%H3671><s%>, with their faces <S%H6440><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>; toward the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> shall the faces <S%H6440><s%> of the cherubim be <S%H3742><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%>; and in the ark <S%H727><s%> thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> that I shall give thee <S%H5414><s%>.

And there I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with thee <S%H1696><s%>, and I will commune with thee from above the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%>, from between <S%H996><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> cherubim <S%H3742><s%> which are upon <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, of all things which I will give thee in commandment <S%H6680><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>: two cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof <S%H520><s%>, and a cubit and a half <S%H2677><s%> the height thereof <S%H6967><s%>.
And thou shalt overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> thereto a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> unto it a border <S%H4526><s%> of a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>; and thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> crown <S%H2213><s%> to the border <S%H4526><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> for it four <S%H702><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the rings <S%H2885><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6285><s%> that are on the four <S%H702><s%> feet thereof <S%H7272><s%>.
Close <S%H5980><s%> by the border <S%H4526><s%> shall the rings <S%H2885><s%> be <S%H1004><s%>, for places for the staves <S%H905><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>, that the table <S%H7979><s%> may be borne with them <S%H5375><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the dishes <S%H7086><s%> thereof <S%H3709><s%>, and the spoons thereof <S%H7184><s%>, and the flagons thereof <S%H4518><s%>, and the bowls thereof <S%H2004><s%>, wherewith to pour <S%H5258><s%> out <S%H2889><s%>: of pure gold <S%H2091><s%> shalt thou make them <S%H6213><s%>.
And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> upon the table <S%H7979><s%> showbread <S%H3899><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me alway <S%H8548><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> a candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>: of beaten work <S%H4749><s%> shall the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> be made <S%H6213><s%>, even its base <S%H7070><s%>, and its shaft <S%H3409><s%>; its cups <S%H1375><s%>, its knops <S%H3730><s%>, and its flowers <S%H6525><s%>, shall be of one piece with it:

and there shall be six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of the sides <S%H6654><s%> thereof <S%H7969><s%>; three branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> thereof <S%H7969><s%>, and three branches <S%H7070><s%> of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> out of the other <S%H8145><s%> side thereof <S%H6654><s%>:

three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>; and three <S%H7969><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%> in the other <S%H259><s%> branch <S%H7070><s%>, a knop <S%H3730><s%> and a flower <S%H6525><s%>: so for the six <S%H8337><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>:
and in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cups <S%H1375><s%> made like almond-blossoms <S%H8246><s%>, the knops <S%H3730><s%> thereof <S%H6525><s%>, and the flowers thereof;

and a knop <S%H3730><s%> under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H3730><s%>, and a knop under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H3730><s%>, and a knop under two <S%H8147><s%> branches <S%H7070><s%> of one piece with it <S%H8337><s%>, for the six branches <S%H7070><s%> going <S%H3318><s%> out of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>.
Their knops <S%H3730><s%> and their branches <S%H7070><s%> shall be of one piece with it <S%H259><s%>; the whole of it one beaten work <S%H4749><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof <S%H7651><s%>, seven: and they shall light <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof <S%H215><s%>, to give light over against <S%H5676><s%> it <S%H6440><s%>.
And the snuffers <S%H4457><s%> thereof <S%H4289><s%>, and the snuffdishes thereof <S%H2889><s%>, shall be of pure gold <S%H2091><s%>.
Of a talent <S%H3603><s%> of pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> shall it be made <S%H6213><s%>, with all these vessels <S%H3627><s%>.
And see <S%H7200><s%> that thou make <S%H6213><s%> them after their pattern <S%H8403><s%>, which hath been showed <S%H7200><s%> thee in the mount <S%H2022><s%>.
